101.comments: All tutorials will be online.  Some tutorial times are not showing properly.  Please click on the Section Comments for each tutorial to see the times.  Additional tutorial sections may be added during the summer.Registration questions should be directed to Dr. Kion, tkion@mail.ubc.ca.Please see the following URL: https://www.microbiology.ubc.ca/undergraduate/mi-course-delivery-2020-21

description: Introduction to virus structure and replication. Detailed examination of selected viruses including polio, HIV and cancer-causing retroviruses. Development of vaccines and anti-viral drugs, the use of virus vectors to cure genetic diseases.
